title: (x) "Triangle 2008 Summer Camps" handwriting font - Timtastic {Mike Y}
content:
Thanks ahead of time for any suggestions on this handwriting font.

-Daniel

 [‹ 01011001](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907031324/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43595 "Go to previous forum topic") [Disc italic w/ chunky serifs ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907031324/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43574 "Go to next forum topic")
author: drbipes

comments.content:
It’s a freebie font called [Timtastic](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907031324/http:/www.dafont.com/timtastic.font?nb_ppp=50&text=Camps+208).

- Mike Yanega
